author: Shawn Boburg, Robert O'Harrow Jr., Neena Satija and Amy Goldstein, The Washington Post
title: Inside coronavirus testing failure: Alarm and dismay among scientists who sought to help...
description: On a Jan. 15 conference call, a leading scientist at the federal Centers for Disease Control and Prevention assured local and state public health officials from across the nation that there would soon be a test to detect a mysterious virus spreading from Chin…
content:
A technician transfers a coronavirus test sample to another tube for testing at the University of Washington Medicine Clinical Virology Laboratory in Seattle.
